name: Giftsfall
description:
This short game is made for this jam: Jame Gam Christmas Edition.

Catch the falling game pieces in the chimney and put them together. Don't let them burn!

Controls: Drag and Drop the falling pieces to one of the silhouette - or Click the left mouse and drag the object, then release to drop. Swipe the pieces away from fire - or Hold the left mouse button on an empty space and move the mouse while it pushes the pieces away from the chimney. Esc to pause or resume. Enter to play or replay.

Leaderboard Screen: Tap the ID number and fill in your nickname. Tap it again or click Enter to submit. You can change it at any time.

The game is designed to be played on mobile devices in portrait mode.

Credits: Me (Part of team: Director, Programmer), Bénédicte Bouyssou (Part of team: Artist), Stefano Mastronardi (Game music "Blitz Glitz"), Bob Hart (Gameover music "O Christmas Tree"), SFX by Ni Sound and SoundBits.
